# Incidence of cancer in NHS Borders

## Background

This report uses publicly available data to give an insight into the incidence of cancer in the NHS Borders area.

It gives an overview of the following:

* How has the number of cancer cases changes over time?

* How has the population changed over time?

* What is the impact of the age of our residents?

* What types of cancer are most prevalent in the region?
